headers.subject: [tosdr:2888] Gittip: [Good] Use of logo permitted without permission

subject: Gittip: [Good] Use of logo permitted without permission
text:
Title: [Good] Use of logo permitted without permission
Topic: copyright-scope
Summary: Gittip permits usage of its logo, but does not allow anyone else to claim copyright of it.
Score: 100

> You may use a Gittip logo or other graphic of Gittip to link to the Site without the express written permission of Gittip. 

Discussion:

I mark this as good because Gittip provides a badge that users can place showing their Gittip activity on their sites. This clause enables the user to use the logo any way they see fit.

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
